package.name: StarSMP_Customers_Tracking_Integration
package.summary: Integrates Magento with StarSMP - digital campaigns tracking and automation tool.
package.description:
StarSMP shows which marketing effort earns the most - ROI. StarSMP enables you to monitor all your digital campaigns and see what actions they bring. Further, StarSMP enables you to automate marketing campaigns.
StarSMP main features: - track actions (anything that visitor do on your website) - automate rewards (automated emails, webhooks, repsonses) - analyze results (grouped and detail analytics of marketing campaigns)
StarSMP Universal Tag - supports Google Analytics, Google Remarketing. Facebook Retargeting and any other custom tracking.
StarSMP Universal Tag Features: - managing tracking tags in one place - add custom tracking codes - automatically deploys to your Magento e-shop - control access to your tracking codes
